refnamediv.refpurpose: block until all GL execution is complete

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: glFinish does not return until the effects of all previously called GL commands are complete. Such effects include all changes to GL state, all changes to connection state, and all changes to the frame buffer contents.

refsect1.title: Notes
refsect1.para: glFinish requires a round trip to the server.

refsect1.title: Errors
refsect1.para: GL_INVALID_OPERATION is generated if glFinish is executed between the execution of glBegin and the corresponding execution of glEnd.
